title: How many pages is a 2000-word essay? - Quora

response.answer_text: On the off chance that you are approached to compose a 2000 words exposition, it implies that you should compose precisely around 7–8 twofold dispersed pages, or 4–5 single divided pages. On the off chance that you actually have questions, at that point keep a mind your statement limit by just searching for the quantity of words on the MS WORD, appearing in the lower left corner of the record. You should get some information about as far as possible and on the off chance that he says that around 5–10% resistance is permitted…..

I’m not sure what standard Earl was working with in his answer, but the publishing industry tends to calculate 1 page as being approximately 250 words (this assumes double-spaced lines and the use of a font like Times New Roman). We also tend to use this calculation in writing courses, and it’s the standard most independent editors use when calculating rates. A 2000-word essay, therefore, would be somewhere around 8 pages.
